record.description: University of Chicago Track Team, 1926. Sixth row: A. A. Stagg (coach) and A. A. Stagg Jr.; fifth row: S. Salamowitz, S. A. Rouse, and J. K. Gerhart; fourth row: L. H. Brill, P. H. Kaus, R. L. Wolff, T. D. Armstrong, and C. E. J. Fouche; third row: G. L. Hitz, A. Dystrup, J. B. Metzenburg, J. Cody, and L. E. Smith; second row: J. B. Olwin, F. J. Hobscheid, J. J. Cusack (captain), A. B. Burg, and C. H. Mickelberry; first row: E. O. Schabinger, L. T. Beall, C. B. McKinney, S. B. Hegovic, and J. P. E. Morrison.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
